actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Elects the following Members to certain committees of the House of Representatives: (1) the Honorable Donald Joseph Albasta of Michigan, to the Committee on Agriculture; (2) the Honorable Joseph F. Smith of Pennsylvania, to the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries; and (3) the Honorable Wayne Dowdy of Mississippi, to the Committees on Public Works and Transportation and Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.
